title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Surges Past $115K as Markets Eye Fed Rate Cut
contentSnippet: Crypto markets rallied Monday ahead of the Federal Reserve’s upcoming rate decision, with bitcoin and ether leading gains.

title: Filecoin Gives Back Most of Early  Gains, Remains Barely Higher
contentSnippet: The token has support at $1.625 and resistance in the $1.634-$1.685 zone.

title: BNB Jumps Over 3% After $1.69B Token Burn, Overtakes XRP's Market Cap
contentSnippet: XRP now has a market cap of $157.6 billion, slightly behind of BNB's $161 billion.

title: ‘It’s orange dot day’: Michael Saylor’s Strategy buys another 390 bitcoin for $43 million, bringing total holdings to 640,808 BTC
contentSnippet: Strategy's holdings account for more than 3% of the total 21 million bitcoin supply — worth around $74 billion.

title: Mt. Gox Pushes Back Bitcoin Repayments By Another Year
contentSnippet: The defunct exchange’s trustee has pushed back repayments to October 2026, citing incomplete procedures and creditor processing issues.

title: Fed Rate Cut Bets Lift BTC, TradFi Frets Over Margin Debt: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 27, 2025

title: Pantera Capital investor on Hyperliquid’s USDH, Paradigm’s Tempo, and the massive potential of stablecoins
contentSnippet: Pantera Capital Junior Partner Mason Nystrom explains his thesis on stablecoins being the core technology to reinvent fintech rails.

title: Rate-cut optimism drives $921 million in weekly global crypto ETP inflows: CoinShares
contentSnippet: Bitcoin investment products bounced back to add $931 million, while Ethereum funds slipped to $169 million in net outflows.

title: ClearBank to Join Circle Payments Network, Expanding Access to MiCA-Compliant Stablecoins
contentSnippet: ClearBank’s partnership with Circle aims to bring faster, lower-cost cross-border payments to Europe using USDC and EURC.

title: Indian court bars WazirX from using customer XRP to offset hack losses
contentSnippet: WazirX seeks to implement a 'socialization of losses' approach, requiring all users to absorb a portion of losses in their holdings.

title: Chinese Tech Giant Ant Group Registers Hong Kong Trademarks Tied to Crypto, Stablecoins
contentSnippet: The group had been discreetly registering blockchain and stablecoin-related trademarks despite increasingly tightened scrutiny in Hong Kong.

title: Fed Interest Rate Decision and a Potential Merger: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Oct. 27.

title: Indian Judge Halts WazirX’s XRP Reallocation Plan Linked to 2024 Hack
contentSnippet: The Madras High Court granted interim protection to a WazirX user, blocking the exchange from redistributing her XRP as part of its Singapore-led restructuring.

title: Mt. Gox Delays Creditor Repayment to October 2026
contentSnippet: Mt. Gox has extended the creditor repayment deadline by a year.

title: Mt. Gox pushes back repayment deadline by another year
contentSnippet: The defunct crypto exchange still holds 34,689 bitcoin in its wallets, according to Arkham Intelligence data.

title: Microsoft Sued in Australia Over 365 Price Hikes Tied to AI Copilot Rollout
contentSnippet: The lawsuit claims Microsoft hid cheaper subscription plans from 2.7 million users after bundling AI tools and raising prices by up to 45%.

title: Alibaba Affiliate Ant Group Files ‘AntCoin’ Trademark in Hong Kong, Hinting at Crypto Ambitions
contentSnippet: While the filing doesn’t confirm a token launch, it shows Ant Group laying legal groundwork to merge its Alipay ecosystem with regulated Web3 and stablecoin infrastructure.

title: Zcash Surpasses 2021 Peak as Traders Bet on Privacy Revival
contentSnippet: Zcash has returned to prominence as traders position ahead of its halving and a renewed appetite for privacy-focused assets.

title: Restoring Privacy to ZEC on Solana via Encifher
contentSnippet: ZEC's price has surged by 380% this month.

title: WazirX Barred from Redistributing XRP as Indian Court Affirms Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The ruling defines crypto as property with fiduciary protections, preventing WazirX from diluting user holdings after a $234 million hack.

title: Japan’s JPYC launches country’s first yen-denominated stablecoin
contentSnippet: The JPYC stablecoin is designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the yen and is fully backed by yen deposits and Japanese government bonds.

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $115,000 as US–China Trade Hopes Lift Markets
contentSnippet: Bitcoin climbed over the weekend as signs of progress in U.S.–China trade talks lifted risk appetite across global markets.

title: Bitcoin surges above $115,000, millions in short positions liquidated
contentSnippet: As prices recovered on positive macro signals, nearly $350 million worth of short positions were liquidated in the past day.

title: Korean Public Company Bitplanet Kicks Off Treasury Plan, Buys Bitcoin as Market Rebounds
contentSnippet: Bitplanet, a publicly-listed firm backed by Metaplanet’s Simon Gerovich and Sora Ventures, has begun its daily Bitcoin purchases.

title: Bitcoin proposal to curb spam with a temporary soft fork sparks debate among developers
contentSnippet: After this month's v30 update to Bitcoin Core, some developers are considering a temporary soft fork to tamp down on arbitrary data, like inscriptions.

title: Bitcoin illiquid supply declines as 62,000 BTC moves out of long-term holder wallets: Glassnode
contentSnippet: A recent estimate from Fidelity found that as much of 42% of Bitcoin's supply could be considered illiquid by 2032, if current trends hold.

title: North Korea Has Stolen Billions in Crypto, But the Ability to 'Fight Back Is Growing': Chainalysis
contentSnippet: The sanctioning of the DPRK IT worker network and recovery of Bybit funds are signs of the growing pushback, experts told Decrypt.

title: 'Moments of the Unknown': Justin Aversano Shares Globetrotting Love Letter to Humanity
contentSnippet: From New York to Antarctica, Justin Aversano's latest work is a journey across continents, cultures, and the human heartbeat.

title: Alibaba’s Qwen Deep Research Creates Live Webpages, Podcasts in Seconds
contentSnippet: Alibaba's Qwen Deep Research now converts reports into live webpages and podcasts with one click. Here's how the free service compares to Gemini, ChatGPT, and Grok.

title: Tether-backed Rumble will debut Bitcoin tipping for its 51 million monthly users in December
contentSnippet: Rumble Wallet will soon support payments and tips in Bitcoin, USDT, and Tether Gold for its 51 million monthly active users.
